titles.title: Expressing support for blockchain technology and digital assets.
Expressing support for blockchain technology and digital assets.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
